General.Name: Newcity (Bangkok) Public Company Limited
General.Description: Newcity (Bangkok) Public Company Limited engages in the distribution of pantyhose products, cosmetics, innerwear, and exercise outfits in Thailand. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1964 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
